channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US and Canada spar over ad of Reagan denouncing tariffs that led to derailed trade talks
item.description: Ontario premier says he plans to run ad featuring speech that sparked Trump’s ire again during World Series but campaign will end Monday After the US ...

item.title: East Wing of White House reduced to rubble as part of Trump’s ballroom construction
item.description: Despite president’s promise to preserve it, the eastern section of the building is now completely destroyed The East Wing of the White House has now b...

item.title: Sex offender who sparked summer riots seen boarding London-bound train after release error, police say
item.description: Hadush Gerberslasie Kebatu was meant to be sent to an immigration detention centre for deportation after assaulting a 14-year-old girl and a woman A f...

item.title: Justice department plans to send election monitors to polling sites in California, New Jersey – live
item.description: In marked departure, federal observers will only be sent to six counties – five in California and one on New Jersey The US secretary of state has conf...

item.title: Pentagon deploys top aircraft carrier as Trump militarisation of Caribbean ratchets up
item.description: Use of USS Gerald Ford along with fighter jets comes as president plots strikes against alleged cartels on land The Pentagon said on Friday that it wa...

item.title: Watch: Video appears to show asylum seeker after accidental release from prison
item.description: A video shared online appears to show Hadush Gerberslasie Kebatu walking along Chelmsford high street.

item.title: US sends world's largest warship towards Caribbean as it ramps up military presence
item.description: The deployment of the USS Gerald R Ford marks a major escalation in what the US says is a campaign to target drug traffickers.

item.title: England's Kildunne wins on club return in 14-try PWR opener
item.description: England World cup stars Ellie Kildunne and Lucy Packer make a winning return to club rugby as Harlequins beat Loughborough Lightning in a stunning, 14...

item.title: Manhunt after jailed Epping hotel asylum seeker mistakenly released
item.description: Ethiopian national Hadush Kebatu sparked nationwide protests after sexually assaulting a 14-year-old girl.

item.title: Leclerc fastest as rookies dominate first practice in Mexico
item.description: Charles Leclerc goes quickest in the first practice session at the Mexico City Grand Prix.
